title: Meet the Syrian refugee behind London's hottest brunch club
text:
In north London, a cosy locals’ pizzeria has been totally transformed, if only for a day. Instead of the usual pies the table is laden with Middle Eastern condiments; gone are the cocktails, replaced by ‘Eastern Promise Juice’, a refreshing blend of pomegranate, mint and lemon.

Over the next hour and a half the guests – all here for the same reason – gorge on several types of hummus, salads, and egg-based dishes. There are ‘Jungle eggs’ – baked eggs with tomato, garlic and onion in a spicy sauce. ‘Asylum eggs’ come with chopped herbs and laden with molten cheddar. On long communal tables we sip on cardamom-kissed coffee and enjoy the last of the autumnal sun. I can't speak for everyone, but...
description: In north London, a cosy locals’ pizzeria has been totally transformed, if only for a day.
